title: The Golden Age - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Historical   Martial Arts   Mystery   Xuanhuan
tags: Ancient China   Caring Protagonist   Cultivation   Empires   Male Protagonist   Mysterious Illness   Mysterious Past   Mystery Solving   Nobles   Politics   Prison   Schemes And Conspiracies   Secret Organizations   Secrets   Wars   Weak to Strong
author: Desert   Sha Mo   沙漠
description:
When you got the crown, you got the responsibility. If you didn’t have the responsibility, you would lose the crown.

The day the young men looked up, the emperor was in no shape to keep ruling the country. So he started hunting for the crown.

This was a tale about emperors being the prey.>
